title: FS: Graded T206s with scans - More cards added

posts.post_title: FS: Graded T206s with scans - More cards added
posts.post_content:
I've got a few T206s available for sale.

Prices included shipping.

Payment can be with Paypal or postal money order, but I'm flexible.

Post or send me a PM if you have any questions.
